verses.name: Acts 7:1
verses.text: Then said the high priest, Are these things so?

verses.name: Acts 7:2
verses.text: And he said, Men, brethren, and fathers, hearken; The God of glory appeared unto our father Abraham, when he was in Mesopotamia, before he dwelt in Charran,

verses.name: Acts 7:3
verses.text: And said unto him, Get thee out of thy country, and from thy kindred, and come into the land which I shall shew thee.

verses.name: Acts 7:4
verses.text: Then came he out of the land of the Chaldeans, and dwelt in Charran: and from thence, when his father was dead, he removed him into this land, wherein ye now dwell.
